name: LingSync Website
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com/ https://fonts.googleapis.com/ https://themes.googleusercontent.com/ ; img-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' ; object-src 'self' ; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com/ ;
